016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import java.util.ArrayList;
019import java.util.Collections;
020import java.util.HashSet;
021import java.util.HashMap;
022import java.util.Map.Entry;
023
024/**
025 * A cyclic hydrocarbon chain as a functional group.
026 *
027 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
028 * @author Nils Hoffmann
029 */
030public final class Cycle extends FunctionalGroup {
031
032    private int cycle;
033    private int start;
034    private int end;
035    private final ArrayList<Element> bridgeChain;
036
037    public Cycle(int _cycle, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
038        this(_cycle, -1, -1, null, null, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
039    }
040
041    public Cycle(int _cycle, int _start, int _end, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
042        this(_cycle, _start, _end, null, null, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
043    }
044
045    public Cycle(int _cycle, int _start, int _end, HashMap<String, ArrayList< FunctionalGroup>> _functional_groups, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
046        this(_cycle, _start, _end, null, _functional_groups, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
047
048    }
049
050    public Cycle(int _cycle, int _start, int _end, DoubleBonds _double_bonds, HashMap<String, ArrayList< FunctionalGroup>> _functional_groups, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
051        this(_cycle, _start, _end, _double_bonds, _functional_groups, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
052
053    }
054
055    public Cycle(int _cycle, int _start, int _end, DoubleBonds _double_bonds, HashMap<String, ArrayList< FunctionalGroup>> _functional_groups, ArrayList< Element> _bridge_chain, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
056        super("cy", _start, 1, _double_bonds, false, "", null, _functional_groups, knownFunctionalGroups);
057        cycle = _cycle;
058        start = _start;
059        end = _end;
060        elements.put(Element.H, elements.get(Element.H) - 2);
061        bridgeChain = (_bridge_chain == null) ? new ArrayList<>() : _bridge_chain;
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public FunctionalGroup copy() {
066        DoubleBonds db = doubleBonds.copy();
067        HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> fg = new HashMap<>();
068        functionalGroups.entrySet().stream().map(kv -> {
069            fg.put(kv.getKey(), new ArrayList<>());
070            return kv;
071        }).forEachOrdered(kv -> {
072            kv.getValue().forEach(func_group -> {
073                fg.get(kv.getKey()).add(func_group.copy());
074            });
075        });
076        ArrayList<Element> bc = new ArrayList<>();
077        for (Element e : bridgeChain) {
078            bc.add(e);
079        }
080
081        return new Cycle(cycle, start, end, db, fg, bc, knownFunctionalGroups);
082    }
083
084    public int getCycle() {
085        return cycle;
086    }
087
088    public void setCycle(int cycle) {
089        this.cycle = cycle;
090    }
091
092    public int getStart() {
093        return start;
094    }
095
096    public void setStart(int start) {
097        this.start = start;
098    }
099
100    public int getEnd() {
101        return end;
102    }
103
104    public void setEnd(int end) {
105        this.end = end;
106    }
107
108    public ArrayList<Element> getBridgeChain() {
109        return bridgeChain;
110    }
111
112    @Override
113    public int getNDoubleBonds() throws ConstraintViolationException {
114        return super.getNDoubleBonds() + 1;
115    }
116
117    @Override
118    public void addPosition(int pos) {
119        start += (start >= pos) ? 1 : 0;
120        end += (end >= pos) ? 1 : 0;
121        super.addPosition(pos);
122    }
123
124    public void rearrangeFunctionalGroups(FunctionalGroup parent, int shift) {
125        // put everything back into parent
126        for (Entry<Integer, String> kv : doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.entrySet()) {
127            parent.doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.put(kv.getKey(), kv.getValue());
128        }
129        doubleBonds = new DoubleBonds();
130
131        for (Entry<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> kv : functionalGroups.entrySet()) {
132            if (!parent.functionalGroups.containsKey(kv.getKey())) {
133                parent.functionalGroups.put(kv.getKey(), new ArrayList<>());
134            }
135            parent.functionalGroups.get(kv.getKey()).addAll(functionalGroups.get(kv.getKey()));
136        }
137        functionalGroups = new HashMap<>();
138
139        // shift the cycle
140        shiftPositions(shift);
141
142        // take back what's mine# check double bonds
143        parent.doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.entrySet().stream().filter(kv -> (start <= kv.getKey() && kv.getKey() <= end)).forEachOrdered(kv -> {
144            doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.put(kv.getKey(), kv.getValue());
145        });
146        doubleBonds.setNumDoubleBonds(doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.size());
147
148        doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
149            parent.doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.remove(kv.getKey());
150        });
151        parent.doubleBonds.setNumDoubleBonds(parent.doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.size());
152
153        HashSet<String> remove_list = new HashSet<>();
154        for (Entry<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> kv : parent.functionalGroups.entrySet()) {
155            ArrayList<Integer> remove_item = new ArrayList<>();
156
157            int i = 0;
158            for (FunctionalGroup func_group : kv.getValue()) {
159                if (start <= func_group.getPosition() && func_group.getPosition() <= end && func_group != this) {
160                    if (!functionalGroups.containsKey(kv.getKey())) {
161                        functionalGroups.put(kv.getKey(), new ArrayList<>());
162                    }
163                    functionalGroups.get(kv.getKey()).add(func_group);
164                    remove_item.add(i);
165                }
166                ++i;
167            }
168
169            while (remove_item.size() > 0) {
170                int pos = remove_item.get(remove_item.size() - 1);
171                remove_item.remove(remove_item.size() - 1);
172                kv.getValue().remove(pos);
173            }
174            if (kv.getValue().isEmpty()) {
175                remove_list.add(kv.getKey());
176            }
177        }
178
179        for (String fg : remove_list) {
180            parent.functionalGroups.remove(fg);
181        }
182    }
183
184    @Override
185    public void shiftPositions(int shift) {
186        super.shiftPositions(shift);
187        start += shift;
188        end += shift;
189        DoubleBonds db = new DoubleBonds();
190        for (Entry<Integer, String> kv : doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.entrySet()) {
191            db.doubleBondPositions.put(kv.getKey() + shift, kv.getValue());
192        }
193        db.setNumDoubleBonds(db.doubleBondPositions.size());
194        doubleBonds = db;
195    }
196
197    @Override
198    public void computeElements() {
199        elements = new ElementTable();
200        elements.put(Element.H, -2 - 2 * doubleBonds.getNumDoubleBonds());
201
202        for (Element chain_element : bridgeChain) {
203            try {
204                switch (chain_element) {
205                    case C:
206                        elements.put(Element.C, elements.get(Element.C) + 1);
207                        elements.put(Element.H, elements.get(Element.H) + 2);
208                        break;
209
210                    case N:
211                        elements.put(Element.N, elements.get(Element.N) + 1);
212                        elements.put(Element.H, elements.get(Element.H) + 1);
213                        break;
214
215                    case P:
216                        elements.put(Element.P, elements.get(Element.P) + 1);
217                        elements.put(Element.H, elements.get(Element.H) + 1);
218                        break;
219
220                    case As:
221                        elements.put(Element.As, elements.get(Element.As) + 1);
222                        elements.put(Element.H, elements.get(Element.H) + 1);
223                        break;
224
225                    case O:
226                        elements.put(Element.O, elements.get(Element.O) + 1);
227                        break;
228
229                    case S:
230                        elements.put(Element.S, elements.get(Element.S) + 1);
231                        break;
232
233                }
234            } catch (Exception e) {
235                throw new ConstraintViolationException("Element '" + Elements.ELEMENT_SHORTCUT.get(chain_element) + "' cannot be part of a cycle bridge", e);
236            }
237        }
238
239        // add all implicit carbon chain elements
240        if (start != -1 && end != -1) {
241            int n = Math.max(0, cycle - (end - start + 1 + bridgeChain.size()));
242            elements.put(Element.C, elements.get(Element.C) + n);
243            elements.put(Element.H, elements.get(Element.H) + 2 * n);
244        }
245    }
246
247    @Override
248    public String toString(LipidLevel level) {
249        StringBuilder cycle_string = new StringBuilder();
250        cycle_string.append("[");
251        if (start != -1 && LipidLevel.isLevel(level, LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.FULL_STRUCTURE.level)) {
252            cycle_string.append(start).append("-").append(end);
253        }
254
255        if (LipidLevel.isLevel(level, LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.FULL_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.STRUCTURE_DEFINED.level) && bridgeChain.size() > 0) {
256            for (Element e : bridgeChain) {
257                cycle_string.append(Elements.ELEMENT_SHORTCUT.get(e));
258            }
259        }
260        cycle_string.append("cy").append(cycle);
261        cycle_string.append(":").append(doubleBonds.getNumDoubleBonds());
262
263        if (LipidLevel.isLevel(level, LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.FULL_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.STRUCTURE_DEFINED.level)) {
264            if (doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.size() > 0) {
265                int i = 0;
266                cycle_string.append("(");
267                ArrayList<Integer> sorted = new ArrayList<>(doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.keySet());
268                Collections.sort(sorted, (a, b) -> (int) a - (int) b);
269                for (int key : sorted) {
270                    String value = doubleBonds.doubleBondPositions.get(key);
271                    if (i++ > 0) {
272                        cycle_string.append(",");
273                    }
274                    if (LipidLevel.isLevel(level, LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.FULL_STRUCTURE.level)) {
275                        cycle_string.append(key).append(value);
276                    } else {
277                        cycle_string.append(key);
278                    }
279                }
280                cycle_string.append(")");
281            }
282        }
283
284        if (LipidLevel.isLevel(level, LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.FULL_STRUCTURE.level)) {
285            ArrayList<String> fg_names = new ArrayList<>(functionalGroups.keySet());
286            Collections.sort(fg_names, (String a, String b) -> a.toLowerCase().compareTo(b.toLowerCase()));
287
288            for (String fg : fg_names) {
289                ArrayList<FunctionalGroup> fg_list = functionalGroups.get(fg);
290                if (fg_list.isEmpty()) {
291                    continue;
292                }
293
294                Collections.sort(fg_list, (FunctionalGroup a, FunctionalGroup b) -> a.getPosition() - b.getPosition());
295                int i = 0;
296                cycle_string.append(";");
297                for (FunctionalGroup func_group : fg_list) {
298                    if (i++ > 0) {
299                        cycle_string.append(",");
300                    }
301                    cycle_string.append(func_group.toString(level));
302                }
303            }
304        } else if (level == LipidLevel.STRUCTURE_DEFINED) {
305            ArrayList<String> fg_names = new ArrayList<>(functionalGroups.keySet());
306            Collections.sort(fg_names, (String a, String b) -> a.toLowerCase().compareTo(b.toLowerCase()));
307
308            for (String fg : fg_names) {
309                ArrayList<FunctionalGroup> fg_list = functionalGroups.get(fg);
310                if (fg_list.size() > 0) {
311                    if (fg_list.size() == 1 && fg_list.get(0).getCount() == 1) {
312                        cycle_string.append(";").append(fg_list.get(0).toString(level));
313                    } else {
314                        int fg_count = 0;
315                        for (FunctionalGroup func_group : fg_list) {
316                            fg_count += func_group.getCount();
317                        }
318                        if (fg_count > 1) {
319                            cycle_string.append(";(").append(fg).append(")").append(fg_count);
320                        } else {
321                            cycle_string.append(";").append(fg);
322                        }
323                    }
324                }
325            }
326        }
327
328        cycle_string.append("]");
329        if (getStereochemistry().length() > 0) {
330            cycle_string.append("[").append(getStereochemistry()).append("]");
331        }
332
333        return cycle_string.toString();
334    }
335}
